encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines at http://abc.org

div.p: Each of the pages in this group supplies information about Schenker Documents Online itself as a project, rather than about the content of the website. These pages thus deal with the history of the project, its administration, the principles on which it operates, those who contribute to it, and the external support that it has received. Select these from the left navigation bar.
